Plastic engineering


 Plastics engineering encompasses the processing, design, development, and manufacture of plastics products. A plastic is a polymeric material that is in a semi-liquid state, having the property of plasticity and exhibiting flow. Plastics engineering encompasses plastics material and plastic machinery. Plastic Machinery is the general term for all types of machinery and devices used in the plastics processing industry.The nature of plastic materials poses unique challenges to an engineer.

 A plastics engineer is the individual who handles the design and development of all materials, molds, and other goods made with plastics.They work to establish manufacturing control plans by reviewing the specifications, the verification, and the validation reports.
